"Truxtun": "This story goes back to the time when Lost Central was known as Central City."
"The place was ransacked by Dark Falz and, well... I'm sure you know the rest all too well."
"More accurately, it was an all-out DOLLS offensive."
"They say the Kvaris ARKS at the time managed to fight off the attack entirely."
"Suddenly though, for reasons unknown, a brutal cold snap set in and trapped the city in ice."
"Quite literally frozen in time. What's been lurking beneath the snow and ice ever since then? Those are Ancient Enemies."
"We don't know if it's in response to our activity, but we think they're starting to wake up."
"The ARKS forward team who had the encounter seemingly managed to escape."
"Well now that certainly piqued your interest, didn't it! Always looking for a challenge, eh?"
"Here, I'll mark the area that's seen an increase in Ancient Enemy sightings."
"For now, I want you to go check this place out and just gather some data."
"Grab some thermal protection, double check your gear, and then head out there."
